portfolio.title: Ai Web Scraper
portfolio.description: This web scraper utilizes AI-powered technology from Ollama to intelligently gather and analyze data from websites. Designed to streamline the data extraction process, it automatically identifies and captures relevant content based on user-defined parameters. The scraper can handle various website structures and formats, providing structured data for further analysis. Ideal for users who need to efficiently collect large volumes of information without manual effort, the AI-enhanced capabilities ensure high accuracy and adaptability in data collection tasks.

portfolio.title: Movie App
portfolio.description: This movie app leverages React for a dynamic and responsive user interface, combined with an external API to fetch up-to-date movie data. Users can browse through a wide selection of movies, view detailed information like ratings, plot summaries, and release dates, and discover popular titles in real-time. The app is designed for an intuitive user experience, featuring search functionality, filtering options, and a clean layout. With API integration, the app ensures that movie data is always current, providing a seamless way for movie enthusiasts to stay informed about the latest releases.
